title: Some X apps do not run with a window border and become unresponsive
body:
Darktable opens without a window border and all contents of the running application are unresponsive to input via mouse or keyboard.
This happens using Darktable v2.0.3 from the Ubuntu repositories in WSL with an X window server on top to handle the GUI.
https://redmine.darktable.org/issues/11396
